author: Alex Piggott
comment: (Originally thought it had battery issues but tried again later and have had no problems since - apologies to devs). Both normal and ambient look great, and the ambient-to-normal animation is eye catching. Only minor issue: On the Huawei, the normal-to-ambient transition doesn't always work in always-on mode (eg it will go black for several minutes or stay in a dimmed version of normal).

reply.author: DualBoot Games
reply.content: Hi Alex!  Thanks for the feedback. In terms of battery drain, our app shouldn't take up any more battery than any other watchface you are using. There can be many reasons why your battery drain fluctuates due to usage, activity,etc. Sometimes rebooting your watch flushes any background apps that could be killing your battery as well.  Thanks! -DB

title: Very nice looking watchface

author: Enelya Ancalime
comment: I paid for it and kinda wish I hadn't. I can't customize the engraving or message as advertised. It keeps telling me to get the basic which I have the only one they offer. So I keep seeing pics of strangers. Image is also  blurry and time hard to see.

reply.author: DualBoot Games
reply.content: Hi Enelya!  The customizations such as the engraving or message should be working.  Please send us an email at help@dualbootgames.com and we'll help you get to the bottom of this.  -DB

title: It's okay but not customized.

author: Charles Mahan
comment: I really like the look but I can't get it to install from Google play.  Play has been stuck on Installing for a couple of days now.  I'm sure I'll love it if it will ever install. - UPDATE - Finally installed and is fantastic.
title: Wont install from Google Play on Note 4

author: Adrian McKee
comment: I thought when this was made into a square watchface either the corners would be filled in or dial would have been squared. Not the the display would be cropped into squareness. Looks a bit unfinished now. Dev no longer listens.

reply.author: DualBoot Games
reply.content: Hi Adrian!  We just published an update with a square version, we hope you like it.  Thanks for your patience!  -DB

title: Love it but

author: William Torres
comment: I just installed it yesterday my watch was @ 100% @ 7 a.m. by 9:45 a.m. i was already @ 23% battery life. Does it drain out that much battery. It does look nice but if that's  a problem then I'll uninstall it

reply.author: DualBoot Games
reply.content: Hi William! In terms of battery drain, our app shouldn't take up any more battery than any other watchface you are using with all the testing we have done. There can be many reasons why your battery drain fluctuates due to usage, activity,etc. Sometimes rebooting your watch flushes any background apps that could be killing your battery as well. -DB

author: Warren Caviggia
comment: This is one of the better looking watchfaces out there. With the android 5.1.1 update,  there was a slight alignment problem that was very quickly fixed. This is actually one of the watchfaces I use when showing off the moto360.
title: Awesome watchface

comment: Hello Still no fix for dim mode...... Would love to have a setting to turn off dim mode, with the new dim mode setting on Wear some watch faces (such as this one) will flash a dim mode even with always on turned off.. it's very annoying. Please add a setting to turn off dim mode in your watch face.

reply.author: DualBoot Games
reply.content: Thanks for the feedback Keith!  We have noted the bug and will look into it.  -DB

title: Love it but..

author: Laurence Hawker
comment: I have most of Duel Boot's live wallpapers so I was surprised and pleased to find this watch face. Can't wait to see what they come up with next after the android wear 1.3 update.
title: Stylish watch face.

author: Anne Stora
comment: Guess I should have figured its not ready for the gear when it didnt show up on the app list.  Love dualboot software so ... when will it be ready for the Gear?

reply.author: DualBoot Games
reply.content: Hi Anne.  We are so sorry for the bad news as the watch you own is not an Android Wear compatible device. The Gear 2 uses the Tizen OS a non- Android proprietary operating system that Samsung uses on some of their devices.  We are sorry for the confusion, please email us at help@dualbootgames.com and we'll sort ya out ;-)  Thanks!  -DB

title: Samsung Gear2...?

author: Steve Ruth
comment: Tried downloading twice.  Get confirmation of installation, but app never appears.  Feeling ripped off.
title: Won't Install

author: Reynardus
comment: I guess I purchased this app but It was not clear at all that this is for watches only at the time.

reply.author: DualBoot Games
reply.content: Hi Reynardus.  We're sorry for the confusion.  We tried to clearly state this app is for watches that use Android Wear in the market description and supporting media.  That said please send us an email at help@dualbootgames.com,we'll be happy to make things right. -DB

comment: I have tried to install this app several times but it does not download fully. It appears to go through the process but it does not allow me to open the app in the Google app store and it does not appear on my home screen on my phone.

reply.author: DualBoot Games
reply.content: Hi Tracey!  This should work on your watch if it supports Android Wear.  Please feel free to email us at help@dualbootgames.com and we can step you through getting your watch working with our watchface.  Thanks!  -DB

author: Leland sprouls
comment: Down loaded without a icon. After download no way to open app. Read after paying that this isn't live wallpaper just a Android watch app. And this should have been advertised as such and not buried in the description!
title: Celestial watch

author: declan d
comment: It's a very nice face. I like the 3D animations. The changing colors by time of day is a nice idea, but it would be better if I could choose the color I like and leave it that way.

comment: Wish it worked for gear s..bouggt it a long time ago when I had a motorcycle 360, later on got a gear S not able to use this, kinda feel like I spend money for nothing :/ since I can't really use it

comment: Very misleading Wont work on the new galaxy s7 it's for a watch

author: Jeffrey R
comment: Great on battery on my Moto 360...and the first 3D watch face I've seen.  Animation and customizations are a nice touch as well!
title: Awesome watchface!

author: Raziel Eragon
comment: It only gives the option to refund my purchase after it has been installed, please either make it work or refund my money.

reply.author: DualBoot Games
reply.content: Hi Raziel! Please be sure you have Android 5.0.1 or higher on your watch and the latest Android Wear app on your phone. You set and customize our app with a paired watch from Android Wear -clicking on 'MORE' then click on Celestial 3D Watch Face thumbnail. Email us at help@dualbootgames.com,we'll be happy to go over in detail how to set you up. -DB

comment: It's 3D, it's animated, it's just really cool looking!  It gets attention

title: Moto 360 2015

author: David Richards
comment: Would be 5 Stars, it needs a battery indicator, then 5 Stars.
Very nice very nicest

author: معلم جبس مكه المكرمة
comment: Nice
title: Shahzad

author: Ja-Mes Champion
comment: Lg g watch. Amazing. People have asked about it. Worth the buck definitely. I very rarely buy watch faces but you've won me over. I don't like the ambient mode to much only because i can't choose the color. Still worth the buy.  Edit. Uses way to much battery. 10 percent in 45 minutes?. What I experienced with the watch was nice. Not for me pretty though. Excellent customer service

reply.author: DualBoot Games
reply.content: Thanks Ja-Mes.  Very strange!  You should be getting a full days use of our watchface without charging. We've tested the LG watches and did not see any abnormal battery drain, in fact you shouldn't see any more battery drain than any other watchface you have downloaded. Our app should be around 2% or less. We hope this helps!  -DB

title: Really good! Kills battery with g2 and g watch

author: Stephen Hensley
comment: At one time, it would show as an option in Wear one out of ten times. Now, it never, ever shows up. Watchmaker solved their problem with this. The Skymaster face always works. Check out their code(s) and release an update. Jeez.

reply.author: DualBoot Games
reply.content: Hi Stephen! We're sorry your having problems. Please try re-syncing all apps in android wear and see if it solves your issue. We're also releasing an update soon that will help diagnose situations where android wear doesn't sync to your watch.  -DB

reply.content: Hi Victor!  Thanks for the feedback. In terms of battery drain, our app shouldn't take up any more battery than any other watchface you are using. There can be many reasons why your battery drain fluctuates due to usage, activity,etc. Sometimes rebooting your watch flushes any background apps that could be killing your battery as well. title: Battery Drain

author: Andrew Breeden
comment: Great work! The new square version looks amazing on my LG G Watch! The ambient mode is also much improved and looks awesome now! Best watch face by far! This company also makes the BEST 3D phone backgrounds too! Keep up the great work DualBoot!!

reply.author: DualBoot Games
reply.content: Hi Andrew!  We just published an update with a square version, we hope you like it.  Thanks for your patience!  -DB

title: Best watch face, new square version is excellent!

author: Larry Carlson
comment: Not one of my favorites. A little fuzzy and unclear. Needs work.
title: Nice design but

author: Gene Fagan
comment: The movement and floating effects are cool.  Hope to see a little more development for the square watches.  Had some syncing issues with my Gear Live but their support team was very helpful.
title: Nice effects

author: Logan Warren
comment: ATTENTION DEVS!  I was initially very excited about this face, and the possibility of  featuring my lovely girlfriend on my LG G watch.  Unfortunately a couple of aspects of the watch face were cheesy and off-putting, so I would like to make these suggestions to the devs:  1. Do away with the shimmering white edge on the square watch face. It looks like pixels are broken, and that edge grabs my attention every time I turn the watch on.  It also makes a harsh border that keeps the watch face from visually blending into the bezel.  2. Do away with the wavy 3d effect (or allow the user to turn it off) of the watch face.  3. Allow the user to choose the option of inserting a photo into the "standard" watch face.  The secondary "engraved" watch face looks like poo, and is difficult to tell time on.  4. Allowing the option of inserting a small digital clock or battery meter into the top of the watch would be handy (handy...watch joke, get it?).  I refer to my watch so many times a day, reading an analog face is a bit slow.  I eagerly await a slightly improved version, and will definitely rebuy it!  If a dev replies as having seen this review I'll change the review to 5 stars.

reply.author: DualBoot Games
reply.content: Hi Logan!  Thanks for the feedback, we have noted it.  Thanks for your support!  -DB

author: clif bartram
comment: This works and looks perfect on my square face G3 watch. Ambient mode looks like something from Tron very cool. The 3D face looks amazing people that see it just go wow! Perfect thanks!
title: Loved this for LG G3

author: Sam Johnsson
comment: This is by far the best looking watch face on Google Play!! Even though it has flashy graphics and animations it doesn't drain more battery than usual on my Moto 360. :o
title: AWESOME!

author: Josh Surber
comment: ...except, the ambient mode doesn't show cards. All my other faces do and my watch defaults to ambient mode for battery savings. Hopefully an option for that can be added soon...
title: Great...
